Class Troop

java.lang.Object
am.aua.StrategyGame.core.Troop
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, Horseman, Knight
public abstract class Troop extends Object
Abstract class for all troop types in the game. Each troop has attack power, defense power, and a cost. Specific troop types (Knight, Archer, Horseman) extend this class.

  • Field Summary
